de.tum.in.osgi.utility.configuration

Class AbstractDefaultConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.osgi.utility.configuration.AbstractItemConfigurationService
      • de.tum.in.osgi.utility.configuration.AbstractConfigurationService
        • de.tum.in.osgi.utility.configuration.AbstractDefaultConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaPreferencesConfigurationService, OsgiPreferencesConfigurationService

    public abstract class AbstractDefaultConfigurationService
extends AbstractConfigurationService

    Title: AbstractDefaultConfigurationService

    Description: Configuration service that can be initialized with a set of default Properties

    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDefaultConfigurationService

        public AbstractDefaultConfigurationService(Properties defaultProperties)
        Create the configuration service. The service will not use the system properties to determine default values
        Parameters:
        defaultProperties - the default properties

      • AbstractDefaultConfigurationService

        public AbstractDefaultConfigurationService(Properties defaultProperties,
                                           boolean fallBackToSystemProperties)
        Create the configuration service
        Parameters:
        defaultProperties - the default properties, may be null
        fallBackToSystemProperties - if the service may fall back to the system properties for retrieving default values
